synopsis.text: In the year 20XX, humanity is suddenly thrust into a battle for survival when a mysterious alien race called the Firow appears and launches devastating attacks across Earth. With humanity desperate and on the brink, a group known as the X Maidens, young women outfitted with specialized weapons designed to combat the Firow, emerge as the last beacon of hope. As the future of humankind hangs in the balance, the X Maidens set out to take on the extraterrestrial threat and defend their planet. This anime promises thrilling sci-fi action as humanity fights for its very existence against the mysterious and powerful Firow invaders, relying on the valiant X Maidens as their ultimate line of defense.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
